text: "No Quiero Saber" () is a song by American singer Selena. The song was featured at the 1996 Summer Olympics in Atlanta, Georgia as a remix version. == Charts == Chart (1996) Peak position U.S. Billboard Hot Latin Tracks 6 U.S. Billboard Latin Regional Mexican Airplay 15 Category:Selena songs Category:1990 songs Category:Songs written by A.B. Quintanilla Category:Songs in Spanish
title: No Quiero Saber
